Articles.Content:
Hello everyone! I've Fenaqua and have waited for some time to start a Let's play video series on Kerbal Space Program Career mode! I have been doing these kinds of video's for some time now and was excited to find out that KSP had finally gotten a new update to career! My video's take us from the very start of career, jumping right into the funding and mission system and will continue all the way to the exploration of the many varied and challenging locations in the Kerbal System!

My latest Video is here! This is the second in the series, in which we focus our efforts on achieving orbit!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5aWYpgYtdS4&list=UUQpBIl7cgJiPw0-9Z23eoog

If you like what you see don't forget to subscribe for more over the course of the next few days and weeks!
